pages.text: Slippery Stone is one of the slipperiest blocks you can create, being even more slippery than blue ice.$(br)When you slide on this stone, you will never lose your momentum, meaning you can slide forever or until you run out of space.
These shoes embody the Slippery Stone perfectly, allowing you to slide forever on any surface you see fit.
The Blazing Gliders have taken slipperiness a step further, these shoes will remove all drag from the player allowing for ludicrous speeds anywhere you please.
